text: 4|131|(Enenral) vanankalil ullavaiyum, pumiyil ullavaiyum, allahvukkuriyanave! (Nampikkaiyalarkale!) Unkalukku munnar vetam kotukkappattavarkalukkum, unkalukkum ‘‘allah oruvanaiye payappatunkal'' enre nallupatecam ceytirukkirom. Akave, (avanukku) ninkal maruceytal (atanal avanukkonrum nastamillai.) Niccayamaka vanankalilullavaiyum, pumiyilullavaiyum avanukkuriyanave. Allah tevaiyarravanaka, (anaivaralum) pukalappattavanaka irukkiran
